{{also|金阙}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=金阙}}

===Etymology===
[[金]] ([[golden]]) + [[闕]] ([[palace]])
: Daoists believed that there was a golden palace in heaven, where immortals and deities resided. The emperor was considered to be the son of heaven, hence the metaphorical reference.
